content.rendered:
Directed by Unni Govindraj

Written by Unni Govindraj. P.S. Subramanian

Star Suraj Venjaramoodu(Peter Kurishingal). Alencier Ley Lopez(Sukumara Pillai). Sudheesh(Philip). Sudev Nair(Bijoy Kuruvilla). Deepak Parambol(Fabian John). Jaffer Idukki(Stephen). Vinaya Prasad(Mariyam). Abhija Sivakala(Revathi Subramaniam). Padmaraj Ratheesh(Kishor). Sreeja Das(Sherin). Nimisha Sajayan(Defence Councillor). Joy Mathew(Narayana Swami). Devi Ajith(Public Prosecutor). Sohan Seenulal(Gireesh). Sruthy Jayan(Ancy). Sminu Sijo(Binimol). Resmi Boban(School Principal). Shyam Mohan(Sumesh). Boban Samuel(Damodara Shenoy). Meera Nair(Nirmala). Santhosh Laxman(Balvindar). Adwaith(Sebin). Gopalakrishnan(Mathews). Shyni(Lini Mathews). Parvathi(Teena). Satheesh K. Kunnath(Latheef). Kevin(Ubaid). Sanaj Kumar(Sathyanathan). Asha Aravind(Lalitha). Dhanesh(Sreenath). Ankith George(Rony). Devananda(Teena Mathews). Zhinz Shan(Manoharan). Stebin Augustin(Satheeshan). Daya Gayathri(Rita). Manju Pathrose(Stephen’s Wife). Chempil Asokan(Juvenile Home Warden). Geethi Sangeetha(Latheef’s Girlfriend). Ajay Gopinath(Rahman). Shahid Jimshad(Instructor). Sibi Aluva(Jailer). Sakkariyah Paulose(Police Constable – 1). Rahul Raj(Police Constable – 2). Kiran Raghavan(Police Constable – 3). Premanandan(Checkpost Security)

Language Hindi . Tamil. Telugu

Producers Sankar Das. K. Krishnan. T.R. Raghuraj. A.D. Sreekumar. Rema Sreekumar

Production Cut 2 Create Pictures
